feed.title: AO3 - Jason Todd/Reader (Filtered)
feed.subtitle: Latest works for Jason Todd/Reader on Archive of Our Own [English, No ABO]

entry.title: It shouldn't bother you...
entry.summary:
Author: Honey_bellie

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,937Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 12

Summary: You have just moved into Gotham a few months ago, you have a new home, a teaching job at a new school, a new sense of normality. Its true that you ran away from your old life, but that didn't matter anymore...new begginings as they say right? Still you couldn't help but feel something is wrong with this city, shit keeps happening to you and it isn't just for the fact you were in the number one "avoid at all costs living here" city. Maybe because you were definitely getting involved with the wrong people, Red Hood...You should be scared of him, but he keeps showing up at the right times when you need him. But you also had Jason, right? Although you could feel he was keeping some secrets from you, not that you could blame him because you aren't much better...Authors note: Reader is a really unlucky girl when it comes to be put in dangerous situations as you will notice along that way, but now she has a certain someone watching over her. He falls first and harder. There ought to be some angst along the way, they are two broken people learning how to love and be loved. Reader has a mysterious past that will be revealed bit by bit, I'm trying to leave clues so you guys can theorize about it. It is planned to be a long fic.

entry.title: you dream of some epiphany
entry.summary:
Author: BrickwallFairy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,644Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 51

Summary: Then, through the voice modulator located in his helmet, the Red Hood goes: “How did you know? How the fuck did you know who I was?”“I – what? I - I didn’t.” It takes a second, just to process who he'd be, because you've spent so long telling yourself to stop holding out for a boy who'd never come back. “You - you’re not Jason, you can’t be.”Or:An AU where your soulmate's last words to you are written on your skin. You thought your life couldn’t get more interesting when you found out your best friend was Robin. You find out you were wrong when you discover your soulmate is Red Hood.

entry.title: Just trust me, you will be fine.
entry.summary:
Author: Bleheh168

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,142Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 1

Summary: One day he asked very quietly: “You ever gonna like me when I’m not hiding?”And I didn't have an answer for that. Not even a bad one. ------You play as the main character (A reader from real-world) got stuck in Gotham, struggling to adapt with this criminals-driven city. But the main issue is still your inexplicable relationship with Jason! You are down bad for him in gears but HAVE BEEF WITH him off-patrol? Alternative universe of A fever dream where Cipher and Jason are not romantically involved.

entry.title: Batfam oneshots with black!reader and little else because I have free will.
entry.summary:
Author: IDNTWTSTIBTBICBBIDTICSTBWYDSM

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,505Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 3

Summary: So I was reading fics on tumblr and was completely overtaken by the sense of 'I need more of this shit it's beautiful'. Of course, there's only so much black! reader batfam fanfics to pass around like a blunt so I got to give to the community and right some of that. Of course, there will be a lot of fantasy AU's and one's where the reader is a cryptid from my culture or batfam is a creature from my culture soooo there could be mentions of gore around. I'll see though. ENJOY READING!!!!!

entry.title: This time I look to see what's between the lines
entry.summary:
Author: Nyxin00

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,331Chapters: 2/4Kudos: 17

Summary: You're a trouble-maker, it's in your blood. You can't help goading men twice your size into an unfair fight, knowing you always have the upper hand. There's something about seeing them go down hard, fast and with a look of shock. It makes your blood sing in your veins. Of course, the one time you get caught the court mandates anger management classes, thanks to your clear record. You'll go, if only to avoid the officer you know is chomping at the bit to kick down your door. And if you keep going for the guy you can share quiet discontent with around the coffee machine, then who's to blame you?

entry.title: The orange peel theory
entry.summary:
Author: Maaaaximilien

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,021Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 14

Summary: The orange peel theory is a theory invented on the internet which consist in asking your romantic partner to do a small action for you. It may be peeling an orange, as the name supposes, or just tying your hair back. It's supposed to mean that if the person loves you enough to do an 'easy thing' which you could do yourself just as easily then they won't mind doing bigger things for you. Basically it's supposed to mean your partner loves you enough not to drop you as soon as a problem arises. It's cute really, until it shows you what you've been missing for years. Both good and bad. You learn that the hard way.

entry.title: Pieces of You
entry.summary:
Author: Widgeon235

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,026Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: Reader comes to Gotham to pick up the pieces after her father dies. She is hired by the Wayne Manor to help Alfred in day-to-day activities. Will she find out the Wayne's secret? Will they find out hers? "I sat at the bus stop, cassette player in my hand, listening to an old Stray Cats album. The Greyhound to Gotham would be here any minute. It had been years since I last saw my father, but it was too late for that now. Now I was all that was left, and I needed to pick up the pieces where he left off." Fic is partially inspired by my own grief. Please take care of yourself, and take caution when reading.

entry.summary:
Author: Thewriting_hub

Summary: Jason was your everything. No matter how many years pass, you'll never recover from how he was taken from you. You still saw him, anywhere and everywhere. entry.title: The Gotham Promethus
entry.summary:
Author: up_tonogood

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,201Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 50

Summary: A reimagining of Mary Shelley’s Frankenstein: The Modern Prometheus, but the creature is Jason Todd. Dick Grayson sails into the Arctic, chasing whispers that his lost brother, Jason, may still walk the world of the living. You are a young artist, hired for an Arctic exhibition, who becomes entangled in a web of grief, rebirth, and a bunch of angsty monologues.
